member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:HealthGateway.Immunization.Controllers.ImmunizationController.GetImmunization(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an immunization record for the given id.
member.returns: The immunization record with the given id.
member.response: Returns the List of Immunization records.
The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401, the client's identity is known to the server.
The service is unavailable for use.

member.name: M:HealthGateway.Immunization.Controllers.ImmunizationController.GetImmunizations(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a json list of immunization records.
member.returns: A list of immunization records for the given patient identifier.
member.response: Returns the List of Immunization records.
The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401, the client's identity is known to the server.
The service is unavailable for use.
